renewed-contributions.title: Spinach and Reconciliation
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE. FictionMags gives title simply as 'Spinach'.  I have not checked the issue to see what title is used there.

renewed-contributions.title: Spinach and Reconciliation
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE. FictionMags gives title simply as 'Reconciliation'.  I have not checked the issue to see what title is used there.

additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
This magazine frequently reprinted stories that had originally appeared in other magazines.  We have not systematically checked the copyrights of those earlier publications.
